question:
A problem in modern industrial nations-a designation that now encompasses more than the United States and Europe-is that when the wages of the middle class are stagnant, the economy expands at a $\(\qquad\)$ pace.
Two Answers
A. plodding
B. normal
C. lucrative
D. pedestrian
E. profitable
F. exponential
